name: Password check with optional values
description: This pattern matches password validation for having 3 of 4 of the following items: lower case upper case numbers special characters^ # beginning of line anchor((?=.*[\d])  #check for digits(?=.*[a-z]) #check for lower case(?=.*[A-Z])  #check for upper case|(?=.*[a-z]) (?=.*[A-Z]) (?=.*[^\w\d\s]) #check for special chars|(?=.*[\d])  (?=.*[A-Z]) (?=.*[^\w\d\s])|(?=.*[\d])  (?=.*[a-z]) (?=.*[^\w\d\s])).{8,} #match any character from 8 start char at the end of line anchor
author: Gianluca Seno
